files.patch:
@@ -862,1 +862,1 @@ -
  • Any media feature can be negated by placing the not operator before it:
    +
  • Any media feature can be negated by placing the not operator before it:
    @@ -864,1 +864,1 @@ -     @media not (prefers-color-scheme: light) { ... }
    +     @media not (prefers-color-scheme: light) { ... }
    @@ -866,1 +866,1 @@ -
    +
    @@ -868,1 +868,1 @@ - media features are true, by placing the and operator between them:
    + media features are true, by placing the and operator between them:
    @@ -870,3 +870,3 @@ -     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and
    -            (prefers-reduced-motion) and
    -            (prefers-reduced-transparency) { ... }
    +     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and
    +            (prefers-reduced-motion) and
    +            (prefers-reduced-transparency) { ... }
    @@ -874,1 +874,1 @@ -
    +
    @@ -876,1 +876,1 @@ - media features are true, by placing the or operator between them:
    + media features are true, by placing the or operator between them:
    @@ -878,3 +878,3 @@ -     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) or
    -            (prefers-reduced-motion) or
    -            (prefers-reduced-transparency) { ... }
    +     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) or
    +            (prefers-reduced-motion) or
    +            (prefers-reduced-transparency) { ... }
    @@ -882,2 +882,2 @@ -
    -
  • Expressions can be grouped by wrapping them in parentheses:
    +
    +
  • Expressions can be grouped by wrapping them in parentheses:
    @@ -885,4 +885,4 @@ -     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and
    -            ((prefers-reduced-motion) or (prefers-reduced-transparency)) { ... }
    -     
    -     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and (not (prefers-reduced-motion)) { ... }
    +     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and
    +            ((prefers-reduced-motion) or (prefers-reduced-transparency)) { ... }
    +     
    +     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and (not (prefers-reduced-motion)) { ... }
    @@ -890,1 +890,1 @@ -
    +
    @@ -892,1 +892,1 @@ - the following expression is invalid, as it is unclear what was meant:

    @@ -894,3 +894,3 @@ -     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and
    -            (prefers-reduced-motion) or
    -            (prefers-reduced-transparency) { ... }
    +     @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) and
